configuration.interfaces:
[% FOREACH interface IN interfaces %]
[% interface.name %]
[% interface.tag %] OESS L2VPN [% circuit_id %] vlan-ccc [% interface.tag %]
[% END %]

protocols.mpls:
[% FOREACH path IN paths %]
OESS-L2VPN-[% path.name %]-LSP-[% circuit_id %]-[% a_side %]-[% path.dest_node %] L2VPN-LSP-ATTRIBUTES [% IF path.name == 'TERTIARY' %] 14 [% END %] [% path.dest %]
OESS-L2VPN-[% path.name %]-PATH-[% circuit_id %]-[% a_side %]-[% path.dest_node %] [% IF path.name == 'PRIMARY' %] manual [% ELSE %]
[% END %]
OESS-L2VPN-[% path.name %]-PATH-[% circuit_id %]-[% a_side %]-[% path.dest_node %] [% IF path.mpls_path_type == 'strict' %] [% FOREACH ip IN path.path %]
[% ip %]
[% END %] [% ELSE %]
[% path.dest %]
[% END %]
[% END %]

policy-options.policy-statement:
L2VPN-LSP-Policy [% FOREACH path IN paths %]
OESS-L2VPN-[% path.name %]-[% circuit_id %]-[% a_side %]-[% path.dest_node %]
OESS-L2VPN-[% circuit_id %]-Community
OESS-L2VPN-[% path.name %]-LSP-[% circuit_id %]-[% a_side %]-[% path.dest_node %]
[% END %]

routing-instances.instance:
OESS-L2VPN-[% circuit_id %] l2vpn [% FOREACH interface IN interfaces %]
[% interface.name %].[% interface.tag %]
[% END %]
11537:[% circuit_id %]
target:11537:[% circuit_id %]
ethernet-vlan [% FOREACH interface IN interfaces %]
[% interface.name %].[% interface.tag %]
[% END %]
[% switch.name %]-[% circuit_id %] [% site_id %] [% FOREACH interface IN interfaces %]
[% interface.name %].[% interface.tag %]
[% END %]
